Games.name: iPogo
Games.description: With iPogo you get a full set of tools to help you be the best. iPogo is a Simple, Powerful and Intuitive App.

Games.name: SpooferX
Games.changelog:
- Added Support for Latest version
- Fixed Scarlet install error
Games.description: SpooferX for Pokémon GO is an enhanced edition of the Pokémon GO app, adding a joystick and with free teleport ! It also include a lot of others features : IV checking, enhanced throw, auto walking and GPX, fast catch trick, a live feed and even a map with everything around you !

Games.name: Sroyzi Brawl
Games.changelog: - Support for ARM32 devices (up to iOS 10)
